Required_Skills: Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI)
Strong understanding of statistical concepts and mathematical modeling
Preferred_Skills: Familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch)
Responsibilities: Develop predictive models to drive business decisions
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify data-driven solutions
Design and implement data visualization dashboards to communicate insights
Qualifications: Master's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, or related field
Key_considerations_for_hiring: Strong communication skills to effectively present complex ideas to non-technical stakeholders
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
